attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment
allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until
the first transaction is mined)
From MonolithDAO Token.sol
attributes.name: increaseApproval

attributes.documentation:
Get totalSupply of tokens - Minus any from address 0 if that was used as a burnt method
Suggested way is still to use the burnSent function
attributes.name: totalSupply

attributes.documentation:
Callable by anyone
Accepts an input of the number of tokens to be burnt held by the sender.
attributes.name: burnSent

attributes.documentation:
Allow distribution helper to help with distributeToken function
Here we should update the distributionAddress with the crowdsale contract address upon deployment
Allows for added flexibility in terms of scheduling, token allocation, etc.
attributes.name: setDistributionAddress

attributes.documentation:
Called by owner to transfer tokens - Managing manual distribution.
Also allow distribution contract to call for this function
attributes.name: distributeTokens
